attributes.action: Stop all lockdown and Covid 19 precautions.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to take note of how the UK public feel. The majority do not believe a word our mps or scientists say. We want the freedom to control our own lives and believe this virus is no more deadly than any other we've had or will have.
attributes.background: The UK public are sick to death of being told what to do. Sick to death of lockdown and wearing masks. We want our lives back to normal. Our freedom is being taken away and it should be our choice how we control our lives and if we want to take the risk.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Lift local lockdowns and Covid-19 restrictions in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551469

Repeal the Coronavirus Act 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313310
